conclusion: Need to determine the speed of the bullet relative to the ground and the distance between two adjacent bullets in the air.
The bullet is fired horizontally every Δt₀ time interval, and the distance traveled by the bullet in Δt₀ time intervals is s.
The speed of the bullet relative to the ground is v_ground = s / Δt₀.
The distance between two adjacent bullets in the air is s, which is the horizontal distance covered by the bullet in Δt₀ time intervals.
